titles.title: To amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability evaluations for compensation purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2058)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Reduces from 20 to 15 years the period during which a total or permanent disability rating must be continuously in force to become irreducible for veterans' pension and insurance purposes.
